Incompatible Device
This app won\'t work because your device doesn\'t have Android System WebView installed.
Update Android System WebView
This app won\'t work unless you update Android System WebView.
Play this game between half innings.
Drag your baseballs to the field to predict the plays that will happen next half-inning.
Tap the payouts tab to see how many points each area pays out per ball.
Once the inning starts, you have 10 seconds to place your final balls.
Use this screen between plays. After every play you\'ll get a card.
Drag cards down to collect them. If your cards match your goal, tap the notification bar to select them, then tap the star to score.
Once per inning, you can change goals by tapping the trophy.
You can hold 5 cards, so drag cards you don\'t want up to discard them.
FANFARE includes 3 minigames you can play at different times in-stadium:
PREDICTION is a guessing game for use between innings
COLLECTION is a card collecting game for use during the inning
CONNECT THE DOTS is an event the announcer will run once per game
Swap between the minigames any time by tapping the button in the corner to see the sidebar menu.
The Leaderboard shows how your score compares to the top 10.
You can see goals youâ€™ve earned here any time.
Done!
